attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of the current situation and Economic Climate. STOP handing British Tax Payers Money to Bankers
without any mandate from the British People to do so. If the Prime Minister calls a General Election without Delay We the undersigned can  Give that mandate to the Next UK Governmment. should we so wish.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
